segments.text: I marvel at the domesticity of it all, yet the scene is anything but serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is like a little acrobat, his hand buried deep in the jar while the stool threatens to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry as I glance back at the woman, who remains blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s an unsettling calm before the storm that I can feel tightening in my chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then, there’s the girl, her anticipation so palpable, so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could freeze time, just to make sure everyone is safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, filled with light and laughter, carries the weight of impending mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR
